title: Minor typo in documentation for Rat.FloatString
body:
by **opennota**: 
http://golang.org/src/pkg/math/big/rat.go?s=12159:12201#L490

   498	// FloatString returns a string representation of z in decimal form with prec
   499	// digits of precision after the decimal point and the last digit rounded.
   500	func (x *Rat) FloatString(prec int) string {


The comment should read as "representation of x in decimal".
